body:
Hi Santiago,


The false color option in Photosphere does do logarithmic mappings --  
just specify a non-zero lower limit, and the scale becomes  
logarithmic.  (This is the default if the "Auto" box is checked --  
will be spelled out in the documentation, eventually!)


Sorry we'll miss you in Leicester!
-Greg
